pega 0.9.2
  • Reference
  • Changelog

PEGA

  • Poluentes, Emissões e Gases de Atmosfera.
  • Pollutants Emissions and Gaseous of the Atmosphere.

Installation

Using remotes R package

remotes::install_github("atmoschem/pega")
library(pega)
library(data.table)
utils::packageVersion("pega")
## [1] '0.9.2'

Emission factors 

library(pega)
ef()
##        Value   Unit source
##       <char> <char> <char>
##   1:   0.281   g/GJ   EMEP
